p:
A value of RR > 1 indicates resistance and RR â‰¤ 1 indicates susceptible. The synergism ratio (SR) values of each candidate synergist were calculated as follows [ 34, 35, 44]:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{SR}={\mathrm{LD}}_{50}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{permethrin}\ \mathrm{with}\mathrm{out}\ \mathrm{synergist}/{\mathrm{LD}}_{50}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{permethrin}\ \mathrm{with}\ \mathrm{synergist} $$\end{document}
SR =
LD 50
of permethrin without synergist /
LD 50
of permethrin with synergist
